mapper.select: SELECT sc.SCREEN_NAME AS screenName, sc.SEAT_NUM AS seats, st.STARTTIME AS startTime, st.ENDTIME AS endTime, st.SCREENTIMEID AS timeId, st.LEFT_SEAT AS remainingSeats FROM SCREENTIME st JOIN SCREENS sc ON st.SCREEN_ID = sc.SCREEN_ID JOIN THEATER th ON sc.THEATER_ID = th.THEATERID JOIN MOVIE mv ON st.MOVIE_ID = mv.MOVIE_ID WHERE mv.MOVIE_ID = #{movieId} AND st.SCREEN_DATE = TO_DATE(#{screenDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND th.THEATERNAME = #{theaterName}
